entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #50045
  • Perf improvement: caching #50044
  • Should this property be removed or marked as Obsolete? #50043
  • Add a `cancellationToken` for `WebApplication.RunAsync` #50042
  • No logs for System.NET #50041

Closed

  • Async code fails when called from OnInitializedAsync #49888
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext #50018
  • Yup, this is by design. Starting in 3.1, authorization attributes are handled by the [authorization middleware](https://github.com/BrightSoul/AuthorizationHandlerMultipleInvocations/blob/master/Startup.cs#L63) instead of being evaluated by MVC's authorization filter. However if you explicitly add an `AuthorizationFilter`, it would get separately executed. #49900
  • Calling Minimal API with IFormFile gets "Invalid anti-forgery token" #49929
  • Empty render when using [RenderModeWebAssembly(false)] in .NET 8 Preview 7 #49949
  • Conditional css class syntax in blazor #50035

PullRequests

Created

  • Update IdentityModel 7.0.0-preview2 & Microsoft.Identity.Web 2.13.2 #50046
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, community-contribution

Updated

  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2242393 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Add benchmarking documentation #50027
    Docs, needs-area-label
  • ServerSentEvents: Support CRLF + LF as line endings #49727
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Provide Selectors for Certificate Chain Components #49789
    area-security, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add EditContext.IsValid(..) to determine if a field has any associated validation messages #48698
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Pass through arbitrary attributes to QuickGrid #48268
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
